concept.title: Report options
concept.shortdesc: When you configure a report, you can choose to include the top five paths in the report results, or only the top path.

conbody.p: Each path in the report shows results for four metrics:

li.p: Number of times the path was traveled
Average revenue that is generated by the path
Number of unique customers who traveled the path

conbody.p: If you choose to include the top five paths, you must then choose one of the four metrics to rank the paths. Your choice of metric depends on the business question you are trying to answer with your path analysis.
If you choose to include only the top path in the report results, then the path is listed once for each metric.
